articles.title: Sentebale: Head of Africa charity brands Prince Harry's brand 'toxic' - BBC.com
articles.description: The Duke of Sussex left his role with Sentebale after the relationship between its trustees and chair broke down.
articles.content:
The head of a charity co-founded by the Duke of Sussex has called his brand "toxic" and claimed it hindered the group, after he and several others quit the organisation earlier this week. 
Speaking … [+4169 chars]
